content.rendered: Being part of the powerful workforce at Regent, Hiral’s positive attitude, tireless energy and passion for data analysis has contributed towards achieving KPI’s and key decision making processes. Prior to working at Regent, she have gained vast experience of accounting and financial data analysis whilst working in the technology sector and she enjoys using technical skills towards the exciting new everyday challenges
